mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hammond's large scale war map of the Western Front ; Hammond's large scale war map Italian Front
Hammond's large scale war map Italian Front
War map Italian Front
War map of the Western Front
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: C.S. Hammond & Company. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 2 maps on 1 sheet (back-to-back) : col. ; 68 x 91 cm. and 66 x 76 cm. on sheet 71 x 97 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Both maps show battle lines as of Sept. 23rd, 1918. [original]
Maps show railways, canals, forests, aircraft depots, wireless stations, forts, fortified towns, and naval arsenals, etc. [original]
Possibly issued with an index, which is no longer present. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: on fragile paper with torn and chipped edges and some fold separations. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: World War, 1914-1918--Campaigns--Western Front--Maps
